doc:
Gloria McMillan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloria_McMillan 0 Gloria McMillan (born March 13, 1933) is a former actress who is perhaps best known for her work in old-time radio. She is known for her role as Harriet Conklin, the student of Miss Brooks and the daughter of Principal Osgood Conklin (played by Eve Arden and Gale Gordon respectively) in the popular 1950s sitcom, Our Miss Brooks. Gloria_McMillan ( born March_13_,_1933 ) is a_former_actress who is_perhaps_best_known for her_work in old-time_radio .
